sections.title: Verse 1
content: Immaculate Mary, your praises we sing;
You reign now in splendor with Jesus, our King.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: In heaven the blessed your glory proclaim;
On earth we, your children, invoke your sweet name.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Your name is our power, your virtues our light;
Your love is our comfort, your prayers our might.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: We pray for the Church, our true mother on earth;
And beg you to watch o'er the land of our birth.
